t: Best Boba brand
s: I've tried many different boba brands, and E-FA is by far the best and my favorite in my quest to find those you would find at boba tea shops. It's easy (follow instructions on bag), quick to cook up, great chewy consistency, and best value for 6.6 pounds (initial price was under $19).
